get.summary: Get all the listings included in the booking engine
get.description: This call returns the list of listings connected to the requester Booking Engine API instance in Guesty and filtered by given parameters

parameters.name: minOccupancy
parameters.description: The minimum value of listing occupancy

parameters.name: numberOfBedrooms
parameters.description: The minimum amount of listing bedrooms

parameters.name: numberOfBathrooms
parameters.description: The minimum amount of listing bathrooms

parameters.name: propertyType
parameters.description: The listing property type.

parameters.name: listingType
parameters.description: The listing type.

parameters.name: roomType
parameters.description: The listing room type. All values of roomType are defined in RoomTypesQueryParameter definition

parameters.name: minPrice
parameters.description: Minimum value of listing price. If it provided, the response will have listings which price is great or equal. Should be passed with currency query parameter

parameters.name: maxPrice
parameters.description: Maximum value of listing price. If it provided, the response will have listings which price is less or equal. Should be passed with currency query parameter

parameters.name: currency
parameters.description: Listing price currency. Should be provided with minPrice query parameter

parameters.name: includeAmenities
parameters.description: Listing amenities separated by coma which should have listings. All values of amenities query parameters are defined in AmenitiesQueryParameter definition.

parameters.name: excludeAmenities
parameters.description: Listing amenities separated by coma which should not have listings. All values of amenities query parameters are defined in AmenitiesQueryParameter definition.

parameters.name: minLng
parameters.description: Minimum longitude

parameters.name: maxLng
parameters.description: Maximum longitude

parameters.name: minLat
parameters.description: Minimum latitude

parameters.name: maxLat
parameters.description: Maximum latitude

parameters.name: city
parameters.description: City name from the listings address

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: Country name from the listings address

parameters.name: state
parameters.description: State name from the listings address

parameters.name: neighborhood
parameters.description: neighborhood from the listings address

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: The list of the listing fields to return separated by spaces. The fields should be taken from Listing object definition. To include bed arrangements to a response, please add bedArrangements to the fields in query params.

parameters.name: checkIn
parameters.description: checkin day in format YYYY-MM-DD

parameters.name: checkOut
parameters.description: checkout day in format YYYY-MM-DD

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit the number of results within a subset. Default value is 20, max value is 100

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: Limit results to listings with specific tag, can be used multiple times for and function

parameters.name: kingBed
parameters.description: one of bed types

parameters.name: queenBed
parameters.description: one of bed types

parameters.name: doubleBed
parameters.description: one of bed types

parameters.name: singleBed
parameters.description: one of bed types

parameters.name: sofaBed
parameters.description: one of bed types

parameters.name: airMattress
parameters.description: one of bed types

parameters.name: bunkBed
parameters.description: one of bed types

parameters.name: floorMattress
parameters.description: one of bed types

parameters.name: waterBed
parameters.description: one of bed types

parameters.name: toddlerBed
parameters.description: one of bed types

parameters.name: crib
parameters.description: one of bed types

parameters.name: petsAllowed
parameters.description: Limit results to listings' unit type house rules

parameters.name: smokingAllowed
parameters.description: Limit results to listings' unit type house rules

parameters.name: suitableForEvents
parameters.description: Limit results to listings' unit type house rules

parameters.name: suitableForChildren
parameters.description: Limit results to listings' unit type house rules

parameters.name: suitableForInfants
parameters.description: Limit results to listings' unit type house rules

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Provide cursor received from the response to iterate over pages

enum: Flat smooth pathway to front door
Path to entrance lit at night
Roll-in shower with shower bench or chair
Wide clearance to shower and toilet

bedArrangements.description: To include bed arrangements to a response, please add bedArrangements to the fields in query params

results.description: List of application listings filtered by given parameters

get.description: This call returns a listing by ID

parameters.name: listingId
parameters.description: ID of listing

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: The list of the listing fields to return separated by spaces. The fields should be taken from Listing object definition. To include bed arrangements to a response, please add bedArrangements to the fields in query params.

enum: Flat smooth pathway to front door
Path to entrance lit at night
Roll-in shower with shower bench or chair
Wide clearance to shower and toilet

bedArrangements.description: To include bed arrangements to a response, please add bedArrangements to the fields in query params

get.description:
Get a list of listings according to their availability on selected dates. 
## Deprecation notice:
   **This endpoint will be deprecated in the next months. We suggest using 'Get listings' endpoint instead (you won't have any capability missing) - https://booking-api-docs.guesty.com/reference/getapplicationlistingslist**

parameters.description: The minimum value of listing occupancy

parameters.name: currency

parameters.name: includeAmenities
parameters.description: Listing amenities separated by coma which should have listings. All values of amenities query parameters are defined in AmenitiesQueryParameter definition.

get.description: Returns a list of all the cities countries and states related to the booking engine listings

parameters.name: skip
parameters.description: The number of cities to skip. Default value is 0

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit the number of results within a subset. Default value is 25, max value is 100

parameters.name: searchText
parameters.description: Search for given case insensitive text in city name

get.description: Return a listing calendar for period

parameters.name: listingId
parameters.description: ID of listing to return

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Begin of calendar form period in format YYYY-MM-DD

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: End of calendar form period in format YYYY-MM-DD

parameters.name: listingId
parameters.description: ID of listing to return

post.description:
Create a reservation. Pre-SCA Stripe tokens (starting with `tok_...`) are NOT SUPPORTED. The API supports only Stripe SCA tokens (starting with `pm_...`)
## Deprecation notice:
   **This endpoint will be deprecated in the next months. We recommend to use ‘Reservation quote’ endpoints instead.**

token.description: Id from stripe payment method (only SCA tokens are supported). More details https://stripe.com/docs/js/setup_intents/confirm_card_setup

items.description: The reservation response can contain the list of errors when there were issues with finding or applying coupons.

get.description:
Calculate and and get full price breakdown for a specific reservation details
## Deprecation notice:
   **This endpoint will be deprecated in the next months. We recommend to use ‘Reservation quote’ endpoints instead.**

errors.description: The reservation response can contain the list of errors when there were issues with finding or applying coupons.

get.summary: Get booking engine reservation by Id
get.description:
This call returns the reservation by ID
## Deprecation notice:
   **This endpoint will be deprecated in the next months. We recommend to use ‘Reservation quote’ endpoints instead.**

parameters.name: reservationId
parameters.description: ID of reservation

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: The list of the listing fields to return separated by spaces. The fields should be taken from Reservation object definition. When the field query parameter value is undefined the response will have the whole Reservation object
parameters.example: status guestId listingId checkIn checkOut createdAt

post.description: Create a reservation quote to hold booking offer for certain period of time. A “default”/”standard” rate plan is supplied for properties that aren’t assigned to an active [Revenue Management Rate Plan](https://help.guesty.com/hc/en-gb/articles/9364117776541-Rate-plans-Overview). Ensure you only use the rate plans supplied with the quote to create your reservation.

checkInDateLocalized.description: Localized to listing timezone reservation checkin date

checkOutDateLocalized.description: Localized to listing timezone reservation checkout date

coupons.description: The list of coupon codes joined by comma

_id.description: This is a quote id for creating instant/inquiry reservation

expiresAt.description: The quote will be expired at

coupons.description: List of coupons applied for the reservation quote

parameters.name: quoteId
parameters.description: ID of quote

quoteId.description: A specific financial calculation process in scope of which it was done (quote based on specific rate plan only

post.description: Ability to add/remove a coupon from existing quote.

parameters.name: quoteId
parameters.description: ID of quote

coupons.description: it will set quote coupons to coupon-1 and coupon-2 and if the quote had another ones the request will remove them

post.summary: Create instant reservation based on quote
post.description: Create instant reservation based on quote to use the same data which the quote holds. Pre-SCA Stripe tokens (starting with `tok_...`) are NOT SUPPORTED. The API supports only Stripe SCA tokens (starting with `pm_...`)

parameters.name: quoteId
parameters.description: ID of quote

ratePlanId.description: Rate plan ID. Ensure you supply one of the rate plan IDs returned in the quote payload. Attempts to use any other string will result in an error.

ccToken.description: payment token id, see tokenization guide https://booking-api-docs.guesty.com/docs/tokenizing-payment-methods

post.summary: Create inquiry for reservation based on quote
post.description: Create a request for a reservation to be confirmed by the Guesty user based on a quote. Pre-SCA Stripe tokens (starting with `tok_...`) are NOT SUPPORTED. The API supports only Stripe SCA tokens (starting with `pm_...`)

parameters.name: quoteId
parameters.description: ID of quote

ratePlanId.description: Rate plan ID. Ensure you supply one of the rate plan IDs returned in the quote payload. Attempts to use any other string will result in an error.

ccToken.description: payment token id, see tokenization guide https://booking-api-docs.guesty.com/docs/tokenizing-payment-methods

reservedUntil.description: Time in hours to reserve the reservation for. Use -1 to keep calendar reserved.

get.description: Retrieve a reservation created with quote by ID

parameters.name: reservationId
parameters.description: ID of reservation

parameters.name: skip
parameters.description: The number of items to skip before starting to collect the result set.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The numbers of items to return.

parameters.name: channelId
parameters.description: Channel name.

parameters.name: listingId
parameters.description: Guesty listingId.

parameters.name: reservationId
parameters.description: Guesty reservationId.

parameters.name: externalReservationId
parameters.description: Channel reservationId.

parameters.name: externalReviewId
parameters.description: Channel reviewId. If this param is passed, others will be skipped

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description: Start date-time of get reviews.

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description: End date-time of get reviews.

subListingId.description: id of Guesty MU child listing in case related reservation is assigned to it

listingId.description: id of Guesty listing that integrated with channel or related reservation is assigned to

complexId.description: id of Guesty complex if listing integrated with channel is assigned to

externalListingId.description: id of airbnb listing or booking.com room to which review belong to

externalComplexId.description: id of hotel for booking.com, empty for airbnb

reservationId.description: id of Guesty reservation linked to review

externalReservationId.description: id of linked reservation in channel

updatedAt.description: date-time of last update in channel

rawReview.description: raw review object received from channel

parameters.name: pointofsale
parameters.description: possible variants of pointofsale - google

url.description: property page url defined based on metasearch requirements
property page url defined based on metasearch requirements

parameters.name: pointofsale
parameters.description: possible variants of pointofsale - google

200.description: Successful operation. Can be empty if no config provided

url.description: property page url defined based on metasearch requirements
